    Library Order_3_0_0

    Namespace: http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/order/v3

    • BusinessObjects 
      Name Description
      Offer
      A product or products available at the given price and terms.
      Order  
      TermsAndConditions
      The terms and conditions related to an offer.
      Payment
      Payment information which may be related to one or more offers.
    • CoreObjects 
      Name Description
      TotalPrice
      The total price of the offer incorporating fees and taxes for each product in the offer adjusted according to the codes in the price modifiers.
      GuaranteePolicy
      The guarantee information to hold a reservation
      PersonProductRef
      Provides a reference between a person and a product.
      PersonDiscount
      Provides a reference between a person and a product.
      GuaranteesAccepted
      TODO- (split between type accepted in location and guest provided)GuaranteeAccepted
      Commission
      Contains details pertaining to commissions.
      CommissionableAmount  
      RebateProgram
      Information about a suppliers participation in a rebate program, e.g. a VAT (value added tax) program.
      Gratuity
      A gratuity expressed as either a percent or amount.
      CancelPenalty
      The CancelPenalty class defines the cancellation policy of the hotel facility.
      PriceModifiers
      Discounts or promotions that are applied to a calculate the rate.
      DepositPolicy
      Describes the policy when a deposit is used to guarantee the reservation.
    • ValueWithAttributes 
      Name Description
      Policy
      Policy information regarding the ancillary for example Power Cart rental policy.
    • Enums 
      Name Description
      Applicability_Enum  
      FeeType_Enum
      A descriptor for the fee amount, such as low, high and average.
      RateCategory_Enum
      The RateCategory attribute defines a set of valid values for the category of a rate. Typically rates are offered as either Leisure rates or Business (Corporate) rates, with a business rate usually including additional costs such as the cost of insurance, etc. This set of values defines the rate categories. Refer to OpenTravel Code List Rate Category (RTC).
      GuaranteeType_Enum
      An enumerated type defining the guarantee to be applied to this reservation.
      Retribution_Enum
      An enumerated type defining the type of action taken when the deadline has been exceeded.
      Commission_Enum  
      AmountDetermination_Enum
      Used to indicate if an amount is inclusive or exclusive of other charges, such as taxes, or is cumulative (amounts have been added to each other).

      Name Description
      Order
